docs.snippet: The hottest team in the majors has so far been able to overcome its injury problems, which became worse in another victory....
docs.lead_paragraph: The hottest team in the majors has so far been able to overcome its injury problems, which became worse in another victory.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column wonders whether New York Mets will be able to maintain winning streak with dwindling roster, after catcher Travis d’Arnaud and pitcher Jerry Blevins both sustain broken bones in 7-6 victory over Miami Marlins; early in season, team has already lost seven players to injury.

headline.main: Mets Managing to Overcome Pain, for Now
headline.print_headline: Doing Their Best to Overcome Pain

docs.snippet: A detective ruled out a fight between rival fan clubs but did not disclose any other motive for the attack. The police often investigate fan groups for ties to drug traffickers....
docs.lead_paragraph: A detective ruled out a fight between rival fan clubs but did not disclose any other motive for the attack. The police often investigate fan groups for ties to drug traffickers.
docs.abstract: Brazilian police say that armed men killed eight members of soccer fan club Pavilhao 9 in Sao Paulo and that they have ruled out attack as fight between rival fan clubs.

headline.main: Attack on Soccer Fan Club Leaves 8 Dead in Brazil
headline.print_headline: Attack on Soccer Fan Club Leaves 8 Dead in Brazil

docs.snippet: For loyal fans of the New York Islanders, this year's playoff run is tinged with even more of a sense of finality, and yes, sadness. Win or lose, these will be the last games for Long Island's only major professional sports franchise before it mov...
docs.lead_paragraph: For loyal fans of the New York Islanders, this year's playoff run is tinged with even more of a sense of finality, and yes, sadness. Win or lose, these will be the last games for Long Island's only major professional sports franchise before it moves to Brooklyn next season.

headline.main: NY Islanders, Fans Count Down Final Days on Long Island
headline.print_headline: NY Islanders, Fans Count Down Final Days on Long Island

docs.snippet: The nation’s 1.3 million active-duty service members are in a special bind, virtually powerless to hold accountable the health care system that treats them....
docs.lead_paragraph: The nation’s 1.3 million active-duty service members are in a special bind, virtually powerless to hold accountable the health care system that treats them.
docs.abstract: Sudden death of Air Force recruit T J Moore during basic training illustrates major health care disadvantages faced by American service members; independent examination of Moore's records indicates serious lapses by military doctors, but Air Force has yet to admit any error; rules bar service members from seeking outside medical attention, and deprive them of right to challenge their care and seek answers by filing malpractice suits (Series: Military Medicine).

headline.main: Service Members Are Left in Dark on Health Errors
headline.print_headline: Service Members Are Left in Dark on Health Errors
